org.diylc.appframework.update.Change.description: Do not mirror bottom layers for Gerber export as fabrication service providers expect a top view for everything
Selecting components by drawing a rectangle around them works glitchy
Switched to AppImage distribution for Linux system, abandoning Flatpak as a means of distribution. DIYLC AppImage will be available alongside with other executables on the official DIYLC GitHub page.
Upgraded Windows installer version and Windows EXE launcher version
Fixed alignment issues of round elements (e.g. solder pads and holes) in exported Gerber files
Fixed the issue with opening DIY files on Mac OS
Added ability to render the underside of boards along with the top side for easier validation, building and debugging
Configurable 'High DPI Rendering' feature which makes the diagram smoother on high-resolution displays but can affect performance
Significantly improved rendering performance
Increased initial memory allocation to 1GB for smoother performance
Upgraded source code structure to modern standards and introduced Maven
Improved robustness of series/parallel graph construction code used in circuit analysis
Omit boards, wires, traces, terminals, etc from Spice netlist output
Updated the windows installer (hopefully) to avoid false positive anti-virus detection
Moving selected components with a mouse doesn't register file modification action and doesn't enable Undo action
Rotating selected components sometimes wacks the alignment off the grid
Ctrl+X (Command+X) shortcut for Cut action doesn't work because 'Project Explorer' steals the focus on X key press
Include windows ZIP package
Windows version doesn't start in some cases
Added 'AI Assistant' that can help with general electronics questions, questions about DIYLC usage and circuit-related questions
'Virtual Multimeter' from 'Analyze' menu traces the circuit finding all possible paths of electricity between two points designated by the probe symbol
Added ability to display switch lug markings in order to illustrate how it works internally
Added a 'Save' button to all analysis screens which saves results of a circuit analysis to an HTML file
Added ability control if the board underside display should render as transparent or not
Added DIY Cloud password reset page
Moved 'Analyze' functions from 'File' menu to their own menu for faster access
Moved 'Highlight Connected Areas' feature from 'Config' menu to 'Analyze' menu
Fully configurable colors for 'Mini Toggle Switch' components
Removed 'DP3T' options from 'Mini Toggle Switch' because that is covered by 'Slide Switch' component and does not belong here
Include components in the underside display that have at least one control point laying in the board, as opposed to all
Applying a variant to a 'Hookup Wire' or 'Curved Trace' makes it lose its shape
Copy operation doesn't work when certain component types are selected
Board underside display does not work if there's a Label or PCB Text component on the board
Using board underside display sometimes makes other components semi-transparent
Fixed Windows ZIP package issue with the bundled JRE
Improved AI Assistant quality of responses, especially when analyzing a circuit
When saving a project to the new file, retain all the AI Assistant chat history for the new project file
Added ability to be logged into the same DIYLC Cloud account from several machines at the same time
Confirmation dialog before deleting AI Assistant chat history
Output current subscription statistics at the end of the chat for usage transparency
Improved styling and usability of chatbot tool
Language selection doesn't work on some OSs
'Connect to Patreon' option doesn't work if the user name contains a space or another non-alphanumerical character
'AI Analyzer' feature added which uses AI to scan the circuit diagram and report issues and suggestions
Significantly improve rendering performance of most components
'Open Jack 1/4"' and 'Potentiometer Panel' now tolerate connections anywhere on the lugs instead of dead center only
Increased maximum number of switching combinations to 256 for circuit analysis
'Pilot Lamp Holder' component can sometimes hang the application
Fixed the issue with embedding image files into DIY projects
Fixed the issue with some components (e.g. DIP IC) jumping when showing underside of a board

Added 'Compare With...' tool in the 'Analyze' menu that compares the content of two DIY files electronically and reports differences. Can be useful to compare two versions of the same circuit or validate a layout against the schematics file.
Increased tolerance of sticky points on guitar pickup terminals in order to make it easier for leads to make proper contact and for the circuit analyzer to work
Improved trace proximity calculation to avoid showing false positives
Improved the styling of circuit analysis reports
X or Q keys sometimes do not register in secondary dialogs
'Auto-Edit Mode' doesn't do what it's supposed to
If the internet connection is present, but unstable, the application starts but nothing can be clicked until the connection restores
Added 'Drill Hole' component that can be used for board mounting holes, chassis holes, faceplace holes, etc
Simplify zoom in/out keyboard shortcuts to only plus/minus keys and zero numerical key for zoom reset to 100
Bundle Java JRE with Linux AppImage to avoid having to install it
Updated naming conventions Mac build packages to replace 'arm' with 'silicon' and 'x86' to 'intel' for clarity
Allow Windows 64 bit installer to run on ARM-based Windows machine (through emulation)
More intuitive user account creation dialog for DIYLC Cloud - showing exact requirements for password and marking optional entries
Improved project search algorithm in DIYLC cloud
When a switch position is selected (i.e. set to a value other than None), DIYLC will treat the terminals that are internally connected in that switching logic as connected in analysis tools
Increase maximum size of the backup folder from 64MB to 1GB for deeper history
Alignment issues of some visual elements in the resulting Gerber files, e.g. DIL IC pin designators
'Connect to Patreon' option says that it connected account with username 'a b c' but doesn't do anything
Added '6P5T (5-Position 6 Pole AxLabs)' lever switch type (thank you mm-rnd)
Added '4P3T (3-Position 4 Pole AxLabs)' lever switch type (thank you mm-rnd)
Added 'DP3T (Import 5-Position 2502N)' lever switch type (thank you mm-rnd)
Corrected 'S1 Switch' up/down position designators (thank you mm-rnd)
Corrected 'Mini Toggle Switch' position names for center-OFF variants to be in the correct order (thank you mm-rnd)
'Drill Hole' changes color to red when selected
Added Silkscreen export to PDF/PNG and print capabilities
Added 'Multiwatt IC' package with 11 and 15 pin varieties
Added new property in 'LP Switch' that allows having the middle terminals connected (as they were) or disconnected to allow more flexibility
Added 'Ending Style' property to 'Copper Trace' and 'Curved Trace' to allow choosing round or flat style
Added Chinese simplified (thank you chenjingyuanku) and Hindi UI translation and updated all other languages with new translations

Added configuration for text scale factor in rare cases when system scale factor is not applied correctly; requires adding a configuration property to config.xml with key 'fontScaleFactor' and a desired float value
Improved behavior of mouse cursor during drag operations; this should also fix behavior on some linux machines that show a "forbidden" cursor while dragging
Improved sensitivity of 'Multimeter Probe' that required pixel-level precision to detect connectivity; improved rendering of the probe in outline mode
Improve contrast of tooltips on some Linux machines that show white text against yellow balloon
Honor label color settings for 'Tape Measure' component
Reorganized export and print related items in the File menu to reduce clutter
Fixed underside rendering and mirroring position issues that affected only SPDT 'Mini Toggle Switch' types
Application freezes when using underside rendering or mirroring on 'Pin Header' when sized at 1x1
'Rotary Switch (Open)' cannot be selected by clicking on the wafer for 4-pole variations
Added ability to name groups of components
Show groups of components as single items in the Project Explorer list
Added balloon tooltip next to cursor showing component width, height and length (where available) while resizing; can be disabled from Config menu
Added 'Freeway 3x3-05 (Ultra) Switch' (thank you mm-rnd)
Configurable 'Tactile Micro Switch' dimensions and added a few most commonly used variants
Exposed the most common pin pairing modes and added switching logic for 'Tactile Micro Switch' to allow using it for analysis
'Potentiometer Panel' can now render numerical lug markers for easier identification
'Auto-Wrap Label' retains line breaks from the input text
'Cliff 1/8" Jack', 'Open 1/8" Jack' and 'Open 1/4" Jack' can be rotated

Fixed the offset of terminals on a DP4T Tele type of 'Lever Switch' to be aligned with the physical switch (attention - this will break existing diagrams and will require adjusting leads to match the new terminal positions)
Make the label of schematic symbols (e.g. 'Resistor Symbol') clickable as well
Ability to resize 'Transformer Core' schematic symbol after it's already placed
Clicking on 'Tactile Micro Switch' body doesn't register
New lines at the end of the 'Label' text get erroneously rendered as br HTML tags
Added Box style multi-turn potentiometer component (thank you chayward)
Added 'M' and 'N' potentiometer taper options (thank you mm-rnd)
'Tactile Micro Switch' editor doesn't show up on double click
